mapper.insert: INSERT INTO room_info(address, bcode, dong, ho, building_floor, building_type, building_approve_date, building_elevator_num, floor, area, rooms, bathrooms) VALUES (#{address}, #{bcode}, #{dong}, #{ho}, #{buildingFloor}, #{buildingType}, #{buildingApproveDate}, #{buildingElevatorNum}, #{floor}, #{area}, #{rooms}, #{bathrooms})
